onboarding.name: Registration
onboarding.collect_name_prompt:
Hi! I‚Äôm Armelle, your tax assistant in Cameroon.
I can help you calculate your IGS, file your tax returns online, keep track of deadlines, and answer your general tax questions!

To get started, please enter your Name/Business name.
Example: MBARGA FOUDA / ABC EXPRESS
onboarding.searching_dgi:
Verifying your identity in the DGI database.
Please wait...
---------------------------------------------
Connecting to DGI services in progress...
onboarding.confirm_single:
One profile matches your name:
Please confirm if this is yours:
onboarding.select_multiple:
Several profiles match your name:
Please select yours:
onboarding.too_many_results:
Too many results found ({{count}}+).
Please refine your search or continue without a DGI profile.
onboarding.complete_full:
Profile configured - {{userName}}, NIU: {{niu}}
Welcome {{userName}}! What can I do for you?
onboarding.complete_partial_error:
‚ö†Ô∏è Partial profile - {{userName}}
The DGI website is temporarily unavailable for verification.
You will be able to link your profile later by typing "profile".

What can I do for you?

igs_calculator.name: IGS Calculator
igs_calculator.description: Calculate your General Synthetic Tax based on your business information
igs_calculator.sector_prompt: Please select your sector of activity:
igs_calculator.subcategory_formal_prompt:
You have chosen the formal sector.
Please select your subcategory:
igs_calculator.subcategory_informal_prompt:
You have chosen the informal sector.
Please select your subcategory:
igs_calculator.previous_revenue_prompt:
Enter your turnover from the previous year (in FCFA):

Example: 1500000 for 1.5 million FCFA
(Enter digits only, no spaces)
igs_calculator.current_revenue_prompt:
Enter your estimated turnover for the current year (in FCFA):

Example: 1800000 for 1.8 million FCFA
(Enter digits only, no spaces)
igs_calculator.company_type_prompt:
‚≠ê GREAT! WE HAVE YOUR RESULT! ‚≠ê

To send it to you, I need a few more details.
What is the type of your business or activity?
igs_calculator.name_prompt: Enter your business name or your personal name as the responsible party:
igs_calculator.phone_prompt:
Enter your contact phone number:

Expected format: Cameroonian number
Example: 677123456 or 237677123456
igs_calculator.other_city_prompt: Enter the name of your city:
igs_calculator.niu_prompt:
Enter your NIU (Unique Identification Number):

If you do not have an NIU, type: N/A
Otherwise, enter your NIU (minimum 12 characters)
igs_calculator.completion:
üéâ REGISTRATION SUCCESSFUL!

Your information has been saved successfully.

üí∞ Your calculated IGS: {{calculatedIGS}} FCFA
üìÑ Calculation reference: {{companyId}}

Thank you for using our IGS calculator!
igs_calculator.error_saving:
‚ùå ERROR WHILE SAVING

We could not save your information.

Error: {{error}}

Please try again or contact support.

validation.invalid_amount:
The amount entered is not valid. Please enter digits only, without spaces or symbols.

Example: 1500000 for 1.5 million FCFA
validation.invalid_phone:
The phone number entered is not valid. Please enter a valid Cameroonian phone number.

Accepted formats:
‚Ä¢ 677123456
‚Ä¢ 237677123456
validation.invalid_niu:
The NIU entered is not valid. The NIU must be an alphanumeric string of at least 12 characters.

If you do not have an NIU, type: N/A
validation.name_required: The name cannot be empty. Please enter your business name or your personal name.
validation.field_required: This field cannot be empty. Please enter a value.

niu_finder.name: Find my NIU
niu_finder.description: Search for your Unique Identification Number in the DGI database
niu_finder.name_prompt:
Enter your full name or your company's name:

üí° The system will search the DGI database
üìù Example: "Martin Paul" or "Entreprise SARL"
niu_finder.no_results:
üîç NO RESULTS FOUND

No taxpayer found with the name: "{{name}}"

üí° Suggestions:
‚Ä¢ Check the spelling of the name
‚Ä¢ Try a different name
‚Ä¢ The taxpayer may not be registered with the DGI
niu_finder.too_many_results:
üîç TOO MANY RESULTS

More than 20 taxpayers found with the name: "{{name}}"

üí° Please refine your search with a more specific name.
niu_finder.note_save_niu: üí° Please note your NIU for your tax procedures!
niu_finder.cancelled:
üö´ SEARCH CANCELLED

The NIU search was cancelled.
You can start a new search at any time.

validation.name_too_short: The name must be at least 2 characters long.
